definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
Xintiandi (shopping, eating and entertainment district of Shanghai)
to worship heaven and earth/ritual kneeling by bride and groom in a old-fashioned wedding ceremony/also called 拜堂
enchanting scenery/beautiful surroundings/world of its own
lit. a gulf between heaven and earth/wide difference of opinion (idiom)
first line of the Thousand Character Classic 千字文[Qian1 zi4 wen2]

sentences.english: The SafeHouse is a place for people of different faiths to share and support each other.
sentences.chinese: 是一個讓來自不同信仰的人士分享及互相支持的天地。

sentences.english: Jiuzhaigou is a world of water, which brings Jiuzhaigou its most enchanting views.
sentences.chinese: 寨溝是水的天地，水構成了九寨溝最富魅力的景色。

sentences.english: The most insignificant transgression reverberated in the most ethereal worlds.
sentences.chinese: 最微不足道的罪行在最超越塵俗的天地裏引起迴響。

sentences.english: All the sites I chose for this article broke new ground in this area.
sentences.chinese: 本文中挑選的所有站點都在業內開拓了新天地。

sentences.english: Dark world the same color, he saw the smiling faces hanging from the V Akira.
sentences.chinese: 天地灰暗一色，只見彼起此伏的笑臉懸晃。

sentences.english: It can be said that Guqin players are always facing the universe.
sentences.chinese: 彈奏古琴，即是面對天地日月。

sentences.english: The lightest feet between heaven and earth, so that we vaguely hear the waves and the Ocean Waves.
sentences.chinese: 天地間最輕的腳步，使我們依稀聽到浪潮和濤聲。

sentences.english: To Allah belongeth the Mystery of the heavens and the earth.
sentences.chinese: 天地的幽玄只是真主的。

sentences.english: Light winds turn LOH hundred years, the warm fog clouds flutter drive world.
sentences.chinese: 光風轉蕙百餘裏，暖霧驅雲撲天地。

sentences.english: While reading the Chinese mythology of how Pangu created heaven and earth .
sentences.chinese: 在聽盤古開天地的故事的時候。

sentences.english: Is really an infatuated crazy idea, in the whole world the order is severe, again can everyone is emperor.
sentences.chinese: 真是癡心妄想，天地間秩序森嚴，又豈可人人爲皇。

sentences.english: Encourage people to get out of their offices and silos.
sentences.chinese: 鼓勵人們走出他們的辦公室和小天地。

sentences.english: The impact the myth of Pangu, the creator of Heaven and Earth has on Chinese culture and beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 天地的創造者盤古的神話對中國文化和信仰的影響。

sentences.english: There was no cause and effect between the Heaven and Earth Society and the Lin Shuangwen Uprising.
sentences.chinese: 天地會與林爽文起義之間沒有直接的因果關係。

sentences.english: In fact tenchi-nage can be done against a front kick for example.
sentences.chinese: 例如天地摔也可以在對手前踢時使用。

sentences.english: Yoshida said she wants customers to enter the cats’ “space” in order to achieve relaxation.
sentences.chinese: 吉田說，她希望顧客走進貓咪的“天地”來放鬆自己。

definition: yin and yang/heaven and earth/the universe
the sun and moon/day and month/every day and every month/season/life and livelihood
primal chaos/formless mass before creation in Chinese mythology/muddled/innocent as a baby
great wide world/marvelously diverse world/(Buddhism) cosmos (abbr. for 三千大千世界[san1 qian1 da4 qian1 shi4 jie4])
good luck/Nature (as the mother of all things)
to grow and multiply without end
